# Welcome to the R Tutorial

This is an interactive tutorial designed to introduce you to basic R concepts using the **learnr** package.

::: {.callout-note}
You can run the code in the embedded R consoles and answer questions directly within this document.
:::

---

## Basic R Expressions

Try evaluating a simple arithmetic expression in the code editor below:

```{r basic-expression, exercise=TRUE}
1 + 1
```

---

## Variables and Assignment

Use `<-` to assign a value to a variable. Try assigning `10` to a variable named `x`:

```{r variable-assignment, exercise=TRUE}
x <- 
```
